document_data.name: Thinkers' Fraternity
document_data.mainbody: The '''Thinkers' Fraternity''' was the guildhall for the scholars and theorists in the city of [[Daggerford]] in the [[Western Heartlands]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|3990 Daggerford}}
document_data.Location: The guildhall was located in central Daggerford along the [[High Road (Daggerford)|High Road]] near the drill field and [[Trade Way (Daggerford)|Trade Way]].
